name: src/combo.js
src/modules/component.js
constructor

params.name: options.cloned
params.description: Invoked after the component is cloned.

params.name: options.cloning
params.description: Invoked before the component is cloned.

params.name: options.created
params.description: Invoked after the component is created.

params.name: options.creating
params.description: Invoked before the component is created.

params.name: options.render
params.description: Invoked when the component needs a render.

params.name: options.mounted
params.description: Invoked after the component is mounted.

params.name: options.mounting
params.description: Invoked before the component is mounting.

params.name: options.updated
params.description: Invoked after the component is updated.

params.name: options.updating
params.description: Invoked before the component is updated.

name: data
description: Returns an object that contains data specific to the component.

name: clone
description: Returns a new instance of the component.

name: update
description: Update the component's data and force a redraw if it's mounted.

name: mount
description: Mounts the component to a container element.

name: el
description: Returns the element the component is mounted to. Use with caution.

name: unmount
description: Unmounts the component from its container element.

name: isMounted
description: Returns a boolean value that indicates if the component is mounted.

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} True if the component is mounted.

return.description: True if the component is mounted.

name: ref
description: Returns the variable name the component is assigned to.

name: src/modules/utils.js
_removeHTML
description: Removes the innerHTML of an element.

name: _replaceHTML
description: Replaces the innerHTML of an element.

content:
![Logo](https://github.com/combojs/combo-js/blob/master/doc/img/logo.png?raw=true)

# Combo

[![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/combo-js.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/js/combo-js)
[![Code Climate](https://codeclimate.com/github/combojs/combo-js/badges/gpa.svg)](https://codeclimate.com/github/combojs/combo-js)
[![license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/mashape/apistatus.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
[![Gitter](https://img.shields.io/gitter/room/nwjs/nw.js.svg)](https://gitter.im/combo-js/)

Combo is a lightweight library for building user interfaces.

## Documentation

* [Website](https://www.combojs.com/)
* [Tutorial](https://www.combojs.com/)
* [API Reference](https://www.combojs.com/)
* [Examples](https://github.com/combojs/combo-examples/)

## Contributing

See [CONTRIBUTING.md](CONTRIBUTING.md)
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "Combo",
  "version": "3.0.0",
  "description": "A lightweight library for creating user interfaces.",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "webpack",
    "doc": "esdoc"
  },
  "author": "Eric Harms",
  "license": "MIT",
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.2",
    "babel-minify-webpack-plugin": "^0.2.0",
    "babel-preset-es2015": "^6.24.1",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.15.0",
    "eslint-loader": "^1.9.0",
    "string-replace-loader": "^1.3.0",
    "webpack": "^3.10.0"
  }
}
